globalAttributes.name: data-bind
globalAttributes.description:
Creates a new signal and enables two-way binding between it and the element’s value.
```html
data-bind="signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-bind-*
globalAttributes.description:
Binds an element’s attribute value to an expression.
```html
data-bind-disabled="$signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-class
globalAttributes.description:
Adds or removes classes from an element using a set of key-value pairs that map to the class name and expression.
```html
data-class="{hidden: $signalName}"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-computed-*
globalAttributes.description:
Creates a signal that is computed based on an expression.
```html
data-computed-repeated="$signalName.repeat(2)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-indicator
globalAttributes.description:
Creates a signal to track in-flight backend requests.
```html
data-indicator="signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-intersect
globalAttributes.description:
Executes an expression on intersection with the viewport.
```html
data-intersect="alert($signalName)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-merge-signals
globalAttributes.description:
Merges a set of signals into the existing signals.
```html
data-merge-signals="{signalName: 'BananaPeel'}"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-on-*
globalAttributes.description:
Executes an expression whenever an event is triggered on an element.
```html
data-on-click="alert($signalName)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-on-load
globalAttributes.description:
Executes an expression whenever the element is loaded into the DOM.
```html
data-on-load="alert($signalName)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-on-signal-change
globalAttributes.description:
Executes an expression whenever a signal changes.
```html
data-on-signal-change="alert($signalName)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-on-raf
globalAttributes.description:
Executes an expression on every `requestAnimationFrame` event.
```html
data-on-raf="alert($signalName)"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-persist
globalAttributes.description:
Persists all signals in local storage.
```html
data-persist
```

globalAttributes.name: data-ref
globalAttributes.description:
Creates a signal that references an element.
```html
data-ref="signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-replace-url
globalAttributes.description:
Replaces the URL in the browser.
```html
data-replace-url="'/page1'"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-scroll-into-view
globalAttributes.description:
Scrolls the element into view.
```html
data-scroll-into-view
```

globalAttributes.name: data-show
globalAttributes.description:
Shows or hides an element based on whether an expression evaluates to `true` or `false`.
```html
data-show="$signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-text
globalAttributes.description:
Sets the text content of an element to the value of the signal.
```html
data-text="$signalName"
```

globalAttributes.name: data-view-transition
globalAttributes.description:
Sets the value of `view-transition-name` for use with the View Transition API.
```html
data-transition="slide"
```
